The work shown is Preying Mantra by Wangechi Mutu.
content.question: The artist collages photographic imagery from across ethnographic and media sources in order to

choices.label: produce a critique of how women's bodies are vulnerable to changing social norms
elevate local symbolic and ritualistic practices in depicting divine figures
fabricate an image that recalls craft traditions typically associated with women
make reference to cultural icons that promote diversity, progress, and unity

content.answer: produce a critique of how women's bodies are vulnerable to changing social norms

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
